description: Mizuki is a typical school girl that goes to the same school as Shou. She is the younger sister of Tetsuro Segawa, Shou Fukamachi`s best friend. At first, she grows a crush on Agito Makishima, but later starts to appreciate Shou a lot more, to the point where her affections have completely shifted over to him.
name: Segawa Mizuki
